summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4846 for the improvement of the alley in Block 34, Denny's Home Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue North and Warren Avenue, from Republican Street to Mercer Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55757, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
